abstract: Bank of America-Merrill Lynch hired Brad Cameron from RBC Capital Markets, where he was a senior managing director covering the energy, mining and media sectors.
snippet: Bank of America-Merrill Lynch hired Brad Cameron from RBC Capital Markets, where he was a senior managing director covering the energy, mining and media sectors.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch continued to strengthen its banking team in Canada, hiring Brad Cameron to be head of mergers and acquisitions for the country. Mr. Cameron comes to the firm from RBC Capital Markets, where he was a senior managing director covering the energy, mining and media sectors.

headline.main: BofA Merrill Names Head of M.&A. in Canada
